title: Supreme Martial Artist - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Godly Powers   Male Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Yao Huo   耀火
description: Qin Fei was once a genius… until half a month ago. Overnight, he lost all of his profound energy and became an ordinary person. This news made a splash in the Northern Profound City. The Qin family took immediate action to investigate the matter thoroughly but didn't find any clues. Just as Qin Fei was feeling depressed, his bracelet suddenly said, 'I could help you.' With a ray of light, a girl appeared.>
